title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Genetics Learning Through Flipped Learning and Digital Game-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain monohybrid and dihybrid genetic inheritance phenomena based on Mendel’s laws of inheritance
Learners will be able to interpret genetic trait combinations with 80% or higher accuracy through a genotype-phenotype analysis game
Learners will be able to present genetic problem-solving strategies categorized into three or more phases using flipped learning pre-class materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
